author: ceki
msg: - Enhanced SocketServer to use a different hiearchy for each client.
- The old SocketServer is available in SimpleSocketServer.
- SocketNode constructor now takes a Hiearchy parameter.

author: ceki
msg: Changed *all* Configurators to be Hierarchy sensitive. The new code compiles but

author: ceki
msg: Changed the build structure to make it a bit more fast compile friendly.
Changed some test scripts to refer to #!/bin/sh
Changed some copyright statement from Ceki owned to ASF owned.

author: ceki
msg: Slightly improved the ANT build file (build.xml).
Playing around with the JMSSink and object renderer of type MessageRenderer.java
More importantly, the RendererMap is now able to cope with renderer for interfaces
as well as non-interface classes. This change was mandated by the use of JMS where
most things are interfaces with concrete provider specific implementations underneath.
